title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Online Mathematics Learning Effectiveness Improvement Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Education-Level Mathematics Knowledge and Online Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can establish and implement at least 80% of a self-directed learning plan of 15 hours per week in an LMS environment
Learners can revise their learning strategies at least twice through analysis of self-assessment results based on the SDOLS tool
Learners can submit three math problem-solving cases reflecting peer feedback in online discussion forums
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
